channel.title: Funified Beta [development]
channel.description:
[center][u][b]Funified is online 24/7! [beta testing] It has amazing pking, 1vs1 area in edge and multi in varrock!
[center][b] Minigames: Funified currently has 4 minigames! All of them are extremely fun to play! 1. Dueling! This is nearly perfect dueling with staking and rules all working! 2. Kill The Leader! This minigame is like capture the captain. There is 2 sides and 1 person from each side is randomly selected to be the team leader, and the team leader on each side has 999 hp! And the leader also hits double as much as they regularly do! 3.Pest control! This minigame is extremely fun to play with lots of people, you have to kill the portals and protect the void knight to gain points, and you can exchange those points for Experience! Very fast way to lvl up! Also has the real interfaces! 4. Barrows! This is nearly identical to runescapes! [/b]
[/center] [center][u][b]Pictures![/b][/u]
[img]http://i44.tinypic.com/2zzi6vo.png[/img] [IMG]http://i37.tinypic.com/2uog9p4.png[/img] [/center] [i][b] [center]Features: -Pking -all skills -4 minigames -online 24/7 -friendly staff -Economy[/b][/i][/center]

item.title: Funified Beta [development]
item.dc:creator: @NewbieNewty Newty
item.description:
@NewbieNewty wrote:

Don’t advertise, especially when it is not even your work.

Read full topic

item.title: Funified Beta [development]
item.dc:creator: @Telenim Telenim
item.description:
@Telenim wrote:

Two words, Yep Dynasty.

Read full topic

item.title: Funified Beta [development]
item.dc:creator: @Tonic Tonic
item.description:
@Tonic wrote:

[quote=“Harleyscape owner, post:1, topic:308486”][center][u][b]Funified is online 24/7! [beta testing] It has amazing pking, 1vs1 area in edge and multi in varrock!

[/b][/u][/center]
[center][b]To play click on the link to the website in my signature!

You can only play using our web client![/b][/center]

[center][b]
Minigames: Funified currently has 4 minigames! All of them are extremely fun to play!

  1. Dueling! This is nearly perfect dueling with staking and rules all working!
  2. Kill The Leader! This minigame is like capture the captain. There is 2 sides and 1 person from each side is randomly selected to be the team leader, and the team leader on each side has 999 hp! And the leader also hits double as much as they regularly do!
    3.Pest control! This minigame is extremely fun to play with lots of people, you have to kill the portals and protect the void knight to gain points, and you can exchange those points for Experience! Very fast way to lvl up! Also has the real interfaces!
  3. Barrows! This is nearly identical to runescapes!
    [/b]

[/center]
[center]Pictures!

2zzi6vo.png807×553

2uog9p4.png799×533

[/center]

[center]Features:
-Pking
-all skills
-4 minigames
-online 24/7
-friendly staff
-Economy[/center][/quote]

1 word, Dynasty

Read full topic
